trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around October 10th 2011
Summary: came home off I-84 east noticed a huge bright light in cloud hovering just above clouds humming sound.
divs: Sighting Detailsat approx. time 1115pm came home from work i-84 had state police cars out on highway working crew on ct. I-84 east bound manch, ct. 06042 saw a large bigger than football fiels pulsating light and reported to newengland mufon but it is not showing up in last 25 reports... so the night unsure but witnesses at work confirmed same thing in manch, ct. when told about incident tonight at work at 10pm on 10-23-2011 3 witnesses from manch, said the same thiing check out a slight rain -drizzle and i drove around area and it moved north toward bradley airport windsor locks and vanished. please post again find old report has date and time thanks. ufo perhaps not ours due to storm and it wasn't life star helicopter in manch, ct. and not an black hawk helicopter to large pulsating thru clouds following along electrical made my wife nervous she heard it.... thanks
